OOC: What is it about this RPG and people not being able to spell 
names right?

Empath::

Had it been anyone else but Windlord, Empath would have flown off and 
ignored them.  As it is, she lands just behind Windlord, keeping an 
eye out for other Predacons.  "You called?"
